hero.title: SAIL
hero.subtitle: Safe AI Learn: Making AI Safety Knowledge Accessible to Everyone

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: AI Safety knowledge shouldn't be limited by language barriers. While most resources are in English, AI's impact is global. We believe everyone deserves access to fundamental AI Safety concepts to make informed decisions about their future.

languages.title: Multiple Languages
languages.description: Access AI Safety content in your native language, making complex concepts easier to understand and relate to.

interactive.title: Interactive Learning
interactive.description: Ask questions as you learn and get immediate feedback from an AI assistant to deepen your understanding.

progress.title: Track Progress
progress.description: Follow your learning journey with clear progress indicators and milestone achievements.

structured.title: Structured Learning
structured.description: Clear, sequential lessons designed for beginners to build a strong foundation in AI Safety.

step1.title: Create an Account
step1.description: Sign up to track your progress and customize your learning experience.

step2.title: Choose Your Path
step2.description: Select from our curated lessons designed to build your understanding step by step.

step3.title: Learn and Interact
step3.description: Read summaries, ask questions to our AI assistant, and validate your understanding through explanations.

step4.title: Track Progress
step4.description: Mark concepts as learned and watch your knowledge grow lesson by lesson.

cta.title: Ready to Start Your Journey?
cta.description: Join us in understanding AI Safety, one concept at a time.
